Uses of Class
ticTacToe.Policy

  • Packages that use Policy 
    Package Description
    ticTacToe  

    • Uses of Policy in ticTacToe

      Subclasses of Policy in ticTacToe 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AggressivePolicy
      An agrgessive policy: if there is a winning move given a game state (Game object) then this policy finds it.
      class  DefensivePolicy
      A defensive policy: if there is a move to block the opponent's X's or O's in a row, this policy finds it and returns it.
      class  EpsilonGreedyPolicy
      to do for next year
      class  RandomPolicy
      This is a Policy which picks an move randomly with equal probability from the available moves.
      Fields in ticTacToe declared as Policy 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Policy Agent.policy
      A Tic Tac Toe Policy
      Methods in ticTacToe that return Policy 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Policy QLearningAgent.extractPolicy()
      Implement this method.
      Policy ValueIterationAgent.extractPolicy()
      This method should be run AFTER the train method to extract a policy according to ValueIterationAgent.valueFunction You will need to do a single step of expectimax from each game (state) key in ValueIterationAgent.valueFunction to extract a policy.
      Policy Agent.getPolicy() 
      Policy Agent.loadPolicyFromFile() 
      Constructors in ticTacToe with parameters of type Policy 
      Constructor and Description
      Agent(Policy p)
      Name of the agent ('X' or 'O') is set when the agent joins the game
      PolicyIterationAgent(Policy p)
      Use this constructor to initialise your agent with an existing policy
      ValueIterationAgent(Policy p)
      Use this constructor to initialise your agent with an existing policy
